data.name: Vaccine Hunter
data.detailed_description:
Special Offer

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1231840


About the Game

"Vaccine Hunter" is a 2d platformer shooter about the adventures of a special agent. The government has hired you to find a secret vaccine against a new biological weapon.

Vaccine hunter will allow the player to experience the hardships of a special agent's life on their own skin. Bioterrorists have launched a dangerous virus and the president asks you to collect the necessary vials with a vaccine that will help scientists to stop the epidemic. You are a professional, so you will have to deal with hordes of criminals alone and by the classic method - with the help of well-aimed shots. Collect all the ampoules and stop the coming apocalypse!

Game Features:
  • Old-school gameplay
  • Soundtrack by Ozzed
  • Steam Achievements support
  • Increasing difficulty
  • Pixel art graphics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Core2Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD2000
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: QuadCore
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
